error.name: INVALID_LOGIN
error.description: This error is returned when an invalid username or password is passed.

error.name: PERMISSION_ERROR
error.message: You do not have permission to view this.
error.description: This error is returned when the user requesting does not have permissions to the entity.

error.name: SAVE_ERROR
error.description:
This error is returned when there is an error saving an entity.
The message will contain all the internal web2project validation messages.
